synopsis.text: Official music video for the song "Uchiage Hanabi" by DAOKO and Kenshi Yonezu serves as the closing theme for the anime movie "Fireworks." This love song captures the essence of a magical night illuminated by fireworks. The video revolves around the blossoming connection between the characters Nazuna Oikawa and Norimichi Shimada, as they experience the enchanting spectacle together.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
